description: Non material amendment to planning permission 24/2794/S73 dated 14/10/2024 for Variation of conditions 1 (Approved plans) pursuant to planning permission 20/1111/FUL dated 20/12/2022 for 'Demolition of existing buildingand redevelopment of the site to provide a part-four, part-seven storey building including lower ground level, comprising 180 rooms of student accommodation (Sui Generis) with a commercial unit for flexible use (Use E shop, financial and professional services, caf√© or restaurant, pub or drinking establishment) at ground floor level. Associated shared areas, amenity space including roof terrace, refuse storage and cycle parking' Variation to include internal layout reconfiguration, replacement of the mezzanine and increase in floor height and relocation of the plant to the roof terrace. Amendments include new front entrance door, alterations to the internal courtyard windows. New evacuation lift and main entrance escape corridor.  Alterations to facilities management, entrance lobby and retail space.  Lower ground floor amendments to suit new layouts/bin store and amendment to the roof terrace layout
